doctors think he lay in 50 degree heat
looking into the Blazing Sun for more
than a day his eyes dried out the cornea
is now scorched and infected no one
knows his name or where his parents are
no one really knows how he came to be
left behind other refugees believe his

the Kurds
they have an agenda they have an army a

they have oil by controlling water
resources they are controlling the

Iraq in northern Syria the Islamic state

offensive Syria's opposition has called

Syria Turkey Lebanon and here in Iraq
and some of the camps like this one are
starting to get an air of permanence

the jihadis were not powerful then but

they're using the fighting in Iraq to
try to carve out their own Islamic
